comment.author: 35034346184@N01
comment._content: This item in the National Museum of Australia, Canberra looks like the same event, from a different angle: www.nma.gov.au/collections-search/display?irn=140866 Postcard featuring a printed photograph of a man on a platform "WE WILL NOT HAVE HOME RULE FOR IRELAND". Object type Postcards Object number 1986.0117.3813 Description A postcard featuring a printed photograph of a man on a platform, with right hand outstretched, with the backdrop of a large Union Jack flag. The front of the platform has the words "WE WILL NOT HAVE / HOME RULE / FOR IRELAND". The postcard is unused.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton and Edward Vielmetti: Thank you for the additional information here. We will probably add the full name and date next time we update the record.
